jjo_function: JJO does not forecast the market or assess the prospects of an asset. Its function is to track coins that are leaders in terms of the volume of funds invested in them and to remove from your portfolio those coins that are losing value. This approach allows you to have all the well-established market assets in your basket and not miss out on new fast-growing assets.
high_fees: Portfolio management is usually accompanied by high fees and percentage charges on your income. J’JO changes the rules: no more hidden fees and unexpected charges. All functionality for investments of any size in one subscription starting from just $11.66 per month. You can use free access for investments in the J’JO35 index with a deposit up to $500.
